hours: (Tuesday - Wednesday: 16:00 - 21:00), (Thursday - Friday: 11:00 - 21:00), (Saturday: 12:00 - 21:00) (Mother's Day / New Year's Day: 15:00 - 20:00)
text:
Oriental Garden
Chinese & Vietnamese Restaurant

Daily Specials
No Substitutions Please

Daily Chicken Ball
S & S Chicken Balls, Chicken Fried Rice, Egg Roll $15.00

Daily Wonton
S & S Wontons, S & S Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice $15.00

Daily Chow Mein
Beef Chow Mein, S & S Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice $15.00

Specialty Noodle Dishes
Please be aware that dishes are spicy

Spicy Shanghai Noodles $27.00
-Spicy Flat Egg Noodles with Shrimp, Chicken, BBQ Pork with Eggs and Peppers

Curried Singapore Noodles $26.00
-Rice Vermicelli Noodles with Shrimp, Chicken, BBQ Pork, Eggs, Peppers and Curry Spice

Cantonese Chow Mein $26.50
-Shrimp, Chicken, BBQ Pork with Mixed Greens over top of a bed of soft noodles

Spicy Beef or Chicken Low Mein $23.50
-Spicy Egg Noodle, Bean sprouts and Jumbo Onions with your choice of Chicken OR Beef

Spicy Vegetable Low Mein $23.50
-Spicy Egg Noodle, Bean sprouts and Jumbo Onions with vegetable medley

Spicy BBQ Pork Low Mein $23.50
-BBQ Pork with Spicy Egg Noodle, Bean sprouts and Jumbo Onions

Spicy Shrimp Low Mein $25.00
-Fresh Shrimp with Spicy Egg Noodle, Bean sprouts and Jumbo Onions

Oriental Garden Vietnamese Cuisine

Vietnamese Specialty Dishes

#94 Bun Thit Nuong Cha Gio $20.00
-Vermicelli Rice Noodles topped with Charbroiled Pork, Spring Roll and peanuts ... add Beef $1.00

#95 Com Tom Kho Tau $24.00
-Steamed Rice topped with Saucy Shrimp, served with Lettuce, slice of Tomato and Fish Sauce

#96 Bo Hoac Ga Xao Sate $23.00
-Spicy Sizzler stir fry, choice of Chicken or Beef served on a sizzling hot plate

#97 Tom Xao Sate $25.00
-Spicy Sizzler Shrimp stir fry in sate spicy sauce served on a sizzling hot plate

#98 Cha Gio $8.50
-Traditional Deep Fried Spring Rolls served with Fish Sauce (two per order)

#100 Mi Hu Tieu Mi Bo Vien $17.50
-Rice Noodles and Egg Noodles with Beef Balls in a traditional broth

#102 Goi Cuon (Salad Rolls) $8.50
-Vermicelli Rice Noodles with Shrimp, Pork, Lettuce and Bean Sprouts wrapped in Rice Paper (two per order)

#104 Tofu Mixed Greens $23.00
-Vegetable stir fry with Tofu

#105 Tofu with Assorted Meats $26.00
-Chicken, BBQ Pork, Shrimp and Tofu with Suey Choy vegetable

Lunch Specials Available until 2pm
No Substitutions Please

A. S & S Wontons, Chicken Fried Rice and Egg Roll $14.00

B. Chicken Chow Mein, Chicken Fried Rice and Egg Roll $14.00

C. S & S Chicken Balls, Chicken Fried Rice and Egg Roll $14.00

D. Beef Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice $14.00

E. S & S Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice and Egg Roll $14.00

Dinners

Dinner for 2 $39.00
-Egg Rolls, S & S Chicken Balls, Beef Chop Suey and Chicken Fried Rice

Dinner for 3 $58.00
-Egg Rolls, S & S Chicken Balls, Beef Chow Mein, S & S Spareribs and Chicken Fried Rice

Dinner for 4 $84.00
-Egg Rolls, S & S Chicken Balls, Bon Bon Ribs, Beef Mixed Greens and Chicken Fried Rice

Dinner for 5 $101.00
-Egg Rolls, Wonton Soup, S & S Shrimp, S & S Chicken Balls, Garlic Ribs, Beef Mixed Greens and Pork Fried Rice

Dinner for 6 $126.00
-Egg Rolls, Wonton Soup, S & S Shrimp, S & S Chicken Balls, Beef Mixed Greens, Honey Garlic Ribs and Special Fried Rice

Side Orders

Egg Roll $3.50
Sweet & Sour Wontons $15.00
Fried Noodles $2.00
Steamed Rice $4.00
Egg Noodles $2.50
Rice Noodles $3.50

Pho - Beef Noodle Soup

#87 Pho Tai Bo Vien $18.00
-Medium Rare Beef and Beef Balls

#88 Pho Tai Nam $19.00
-Medium Rare Beef and Beef Bellies

#89 Pho Tai $18.00
-Medium Rare Beef

#90 Pho Bo Vien $18.00
-Beef Balls

#91 Pho Dac Biet $20.00
-Medium Rare Beef, Beef Bellies and Beef Balls

BEVERAGES

Pop $2.50
Milk - white or chocolate $2.50
Bubble Tea $8.00
Coffee or Tea $2.00
Teapot $3.00
Vietnamese Coffee $6.00
Beer - domestic $6.50
Beer - imported $7.50
Wine - glass $6.50
Wine - ½ litre $16.00
Wine - 1 litre $28.00

Prices are subjected to change without notice.
Please inform your server of any allergies prior to ordering.

Oriental Garden
Chinese & Vietnamese Restaurant

ph 807.767.4177 1091 Dawson Road, Thunder Bay, ON P7B 1K8

Hours
Tuesday - Wednesday 4pm - 9pm
Thursday - Friday 11am - 9pm
Saturday 12pm - 9pm
Sunday / Monday CLOSED
Mother's Day 3pm - 8pm
New Year's Day 3pm - 8pm
